full_description: use both arms to grab the roller on the table and lift it to z>0.8(m)
schema: {A} notifies the roller. 'arm' use literal here
preference: num of words should not exceed 10.

template_example.visual_state_description: I can see a roller on the table. The grippers are open, and are not close enough to grasp the roller.
template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. I will use dual arms to grab the roller first. Then I will lift the arms at the same time to lift the roller.
template_example.language_plan: I will use dual arms to grab the roller first. Then I will lift the arms at the same time to lift the roller.
